directions: Fry bacon until crispy and set a side keeping the grease in the pan.
Add apple and onion to pan with bacon fat and cook till onions are clear.
Slice chicken to create a pocket for stuffing.
Bake uncovered for 30-40 minutes at 350. Make sure the chicken juices are running clear and the center is no longer pink.
ingredients: 2 gala apples cored and peeled and diced
title: Apple Bacon Stuffed Chicken Breasts
